name: The Misty Forest
description:
The Misty Forest is a game about a monster who is lost in the forest and is trying to find his family so he can reunite with them.

The game aims to unlock doors to get to the next level to achieve this you must collect the 3 keys that will be scattered around the level after collecting these 3 keys.

You can enter the locked door into the next level. There are also 5 levels you must complete.

How to play press left and right on the arrow keys to move right for forward and left for back, space for jump and press twice for double jump.
